components.description:
An ox, a bovine used as a draft animal. Depicted in brown in full profile on all fours facing left, with a tail and short horns.

One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac. Often used to represent ‚ôâ Taurus (the Bull) in the Western zodiac. 2021 is Year of the Ox.

Often used to represent a bull and occasionally paired with üí© Pile of Poo to stand in for slang terms. Not to be confused with üêÉ Water Buffalo.
components.title: Ox

description:
An ox, a bovine used as a draft animal. Depicted in brown in full profile on all fours facing left, with a tail and short horns.

One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac. Often used to represent ‚ôâ Taurus (the Bull) in the Western zodiac. 2021 is Year of the Ox.

Often used to represent a bull and occasionally paired with üí© Pile of Poo to stand in for slang terms. Not to be confused with üêÉ Water Buffalo.
title: Ox

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Animal symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: Ox was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy http://emojipedia.org/ox/
emoji_net_data.name: ox

bn:00090506v: Of a cow or bull, to make its characteristic lowing sound.
Make a low noise, characteristic of bovines

bn:00054026n: The edible flesh of animals, especially that of mammals.
Meat is the flesh of an animal which is eaten.
Meat is animal flesh that is eaten as food.
The flesh of an animal used as food.
The flesh of animals (including fishes and birds and snails) used as food

bn:00013780n: One of the constellations of the zodiac
The second sign of the zodiac; the sun is in this sign from about April 20 to May 20.
Someone with a Taurus star sign
Someone with a Taurus star sign.
The second sign of the zodiac; the sun is in this sign from about April 20 to May 20
Taurus is one of the constellations of the zodiac, which means it is crossed by the plane of the ecliptic.

bn:00059960n: Any bovine animal used as a beast of burden.
An ox, also known as a bullock in Australia, New Zealand and India, is a bovine trained as a draft animal.
Any bovine animal (tribe Bovini) used as a beast of burden
An adult castrated bull of the genus Bos; especially Bos taurus

bn:00013774n: Uncastrated adult male of domestic cattle
An adult male of domesticated cattle or oxen.

bn:00023381n: Female of domestic cattle: "`moo-cow' is a child's term"

apple_vendor_description: The ox emoji on Apple devices presents a powerful yet gentle bovine with a rich, earthy brown coat, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. Its sturdy frame and calm, steady gaze embody strength, diligence, and reliability, often used to signify hard work or a steadfast nature in communication. The soft, rounded edges of its form contribute to its approachable yet formidable appearance, a hallmark of Apple's design.
